name: Beyond The Senses: Lucid Dreamers
description:
BTS:LD is a 2D retro adventure developed for Android. The game offers unique battle system and mechanics. With its atmosphere inspired by old school JRPGs, it is bound to appeal to both seasoned and novice players.

Follow the story of a group of friends who share the same dream world, despite being unaware of it. One of them accidentally "awakens" to the ability of shaping the world to his own will.
Strange occurrences start happening as the others gradually awaken as well, the world seemingly falling apart.

Will they solve the mystery before it's too late?
